00029 void usage(const char *s) {
00030         cerr << "usage:\n" << s
00031                         << "[<cam number>|<video file>]  [-m <model image>] [-r]\n"
00032                         "       -m      specifies model image\n"
00033                         "       -r      do not load any data\n"
00034                         "       -t      train a new classifier\n"
00035                         "       -g      recompute geometric calibration\n"
00036                         "       -l      rebuild irradiance map from scratch\n";
00037         exit(1);
00038 }
00039 
00040 int main( int argc, char** argv )
00041 {
00042         CvCapture* capture = 0;
00043 
00044         const char *captureSrc = "0";
00045         bool redo_geom=false;
00046         bool redo_training=false;
00047         bool redo_lighting=false;
00048 
00049         char *modelFile = "model.bmp";
00050         // parse command line
00051         for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00052                 if (strcmp(argv[i], "-m") ==0) {
00053                         if (i==argc-1) usage(argv[0]);
00054                         modelFile = argv[i+1];
00055                         i++;
00056                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-r")==0) {
00057                         redo_geom=redo_training=redo_lighting=true;
00058                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-g")==0) {
00059                         redo_geom=redo_lighting=true;
00060                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-l")==0) {
00061                         redo_lighting=true;
00062                 } else if (strcmp(argv[i], "-t")==0) {
00063                         redo_training=true;
00064                 } else if (argv[i][0]=='-') {
00065                         usage(argv[0]);
00066                 } else {
00067                         captureSrc = argv[i];
00068                 }
00069         }
00070 
00071         if(strlen(captureSrc) == 1 && isdigit(captureSrc[0]))
00072                 capture = cvCaptureFromCAM( captureSrc[0]-'0');
00073         else 
00074                 capture = cvCaptureFromAVI( captureSrc ); 
00075 
00076         if( !capture )
00077         {
00078                 cerr <<"Could not initialize capturing from " << captureSrc << " ...\n";
00079                 return -1;
00080         }
00081 
00082         // Allocate the detector object
00083         CalibModel model(modelFile);
00084 
00085         if (!model.buildCached(capture, !redo_training)) {
00086                 cout << "model.buildCached() failed.\n";
00087                 return 1;
00088         }
00089 
00090         cout << "Model build. Starting geometric calibration.\n";
00091 
00092         if (!geometric_calibration(model,capture, !redo_geom)) {
00093                 cerr << "Geometric calibration failed.\n";
00094                 return 2;
00095         }
00096 
00097         cout << "Geometric calibration OK. Calibrating light...\n";
00098         
00099         photometric_calibration(model, capture, 150, !redo_lighting);
00100 }
00101 
00102 bool geometric_calibration(CalibModel &model, CvCapture *capture, bool cache)
00103 {
00104 
00105         if (cache && model.augm.LoadOptimalStructureFromFile("camera_c.txt", "camera_r_t.txt")) {
00106                 return true;
00107         }
00108 
00109         const char *win = "BazAR";
00110 
00111         IplImage*gray=0;
00112 
00113         cvNamedWindow(win, CV_WINDOW_AUTOSIZE);
00114 
00115         CamCalibration calib;
00116 
00117         IplImage* frame = cvQueryFrame(capture);
00118         calib.AddCamera(frame->width, frame->height);
00119         IplImage* display=cvCloneImage(frame);
00120 
00121         bool success=false;
00122 
00123         int nbHomography =0;
00124         while (1)
00125         {
00126                 // acquire image
00127                 frame = cvQueryFrame( capture );
00128                 if( !frame )
00129                         break;
00130 
00131                 // convert it to gray levels, if required
00132                 if (frame->nChannels >1) {
00133                         if( !gray ) 
00134                                 gray = cvCreateImage( cvGetSize(frame), IPL_DEPTH_8U, 1 );
00135                         cvCvtColor(frame, gray, CV_RGB2GRAY);
00136                 } else {
00137                         gray = frame;
00138                 }
00139 
00140                 // run the detector
00141                 if (model.detector.detect(gray)) {
00142                         add_detected_homography(model.detector, calib);
00143                         nbHomography++;
00144                         cout << nbHomography << " homographies.\n";
00145                         if (nbHomography >=70) {
00146                                 if (calib.Calibrate(
00147                                                         50, // max hom
00148                                                         2,   // random
00149                                                         3,
00150                                                         3,   // padding ratio 1/2
00151                                                         0,
00152                                                         0,
00153                                                         0.0078125,      //alpha
00154                                                         0.9,            //beta
00155                                                         0.001953125,//gamma
00156                                                         12,       // iter
00157                                                         0.05, //eps
00158                                                         3   //postfilter eps
00159                                                    )) 
00160                                 {
00161                                         calib.PrintOptimizedResultsToFile1();
00162                                         success=true;
00163                                         break;
00164                                 }
00165                         }
00166                 }
00167                 show_result(model.detector, frame, display);
00168                 cvShowImage(win, display);
00169 
00170                 int k=cvWaitKey(10);
00171                 if (k=='q' || k== 27)
00172                         break;
00173         }
00174 
00175         cvReleaseImage(&display);
00176         if (frame->nChannels > 1)
00177                 cvReleaseImage(&gray);
00178         if (success && model.augm.LoadOptimalStructureFromFile("camera_c.txt", "camera_r_t.txt")) {
00179                 return true;
00180         }
00181         return false;
00182 }
00183 
00184 bool photometric_calibration(CalibModel &model, CvCapture *capture, 
00185                 int nbImages, bool cache)
00186 {
00187 
00188         if (cache) model.map.load();
00189 
00190         const char *win = "BazAR";
00191 
00192         IplImage*gray=0;
00193 
00194         cvNamedWindow(win, CV_WINDOW_AUTOSIZE);
00195         cvNamedWindow("LightMap", CV_WINDOW_AUTOSIZE);
00196 
00197         IplImage* frame = 0;
00198         IplImage* display=cvCloneImage(cvQueryFrame(capture));
00199 
00200         int nbHomography =0;
00201         LightCollector lc(model.map.reflc);
00202         IplImage *lightmap = cvCreateImage(cvGetSize(model.map.map.getIm()), IPL_DEPTH_8U, 
00203                                 lc.avgChannels);
00204         while (1)
00205         {
00206                 // acquire image
00207                 frame = cvQueryFrame( capture );
00208                 /*
00209                 if (frame) cvReleaseImage(&frame);
00210                 frame = cvLoadImage("model.bmp",1);
00211                 */
00212                 if( !frame )
00213                         break;
00214 
00215                 // convert it to gray levels, if required
00216                 if (frame->nChannels >1) {
00217                         if( !gray ) 
00218                                 gray = cvCreateImage( cvGetSize(frame), IPL_DEPTH_8U, 1 );
00219                         cvCvtColor(frame, gray, CV_RGB2GRAY);
00220                 } else {
00221                         gray = frame;
00222                 }
00223 
00224                 // run the detector
00225                 if (model.detector.detect(gray)) {
00226                         // 2d homography found
00227                         nbHomography++;
00228 
00229                         // Computes 3D pose and surface normal
00230                         model.augm.Clear();
00231                         add_detected_homography(model.detector, model.augm);
00232                         model.augm.Accomodate(4, 1e-4);
00233                         CvMat *mat = model.augm.GetObjectToWorld();
00234                         float normal[3];
00235                         for (int j=0;j<3;j++) normal[j] = cvGet2D(mat, j, 2).val[0];
00236                         cvReleaseMat(&mat);
00237 
00238                         // average pixels over triangles
00239                         lc.averageImage(frame,model.detector.H);
00240 
00241                         // add observations
00242                         if (!model.map.isReady())
00243                                 model.map.addNormal(normal, lc, 0);
00244 
00245                         if (!model.map.isReady() && nbHomography >= nbImages) {
00246                                 if (model.map.computeLightParams()) {
00247                                         model.map.save();
00248                                         const float *gain = model.map.getGain(0);
00249                                         const float *bias = model.map.getBias(0);
00250                                         cout << "Gain: " << gain[0] << ", " << gain[1] << ", " << gain[2] << endl;
00251                                         cout << "Bias: " << bias[0] << ", " << bias[1] << ", " << bias[2] << endl;
00252                                 }
00253                         } 
00254                 } 
00255                 
00256                 if (model.map.isReady()) {
00257                         double min, max;
00258                         IplImage *map = model.map.map.getIm();
00259                         cvSetImageCOI(map, 2);
00260                         cvMinMaxLoc(map, &min, &max);
00261                         cvSetImageCOI(map, 0);
00262                         assert(map->nChannels == lightmap->nChannels);
00263                         cvConvertScale(map, lightmap, 128, 0);
00264                         cvShowImage("LightMap", lightmap);
00265                         augment_scene(model, frame, display);
00266                 } else {
00267                         cvCopy(frame,display);
00268                         if (model.detector.object_is_detected)
00269                                 lc.drawGrid(display, model.detector.H);
00270                 }
00271 
00272                 cvShowImage(win, display);
00273 
00274                 int k=cvWaitKey(10);
00275                 if (k=='q' || k== 27)
00276                         break;
00277         }
00278 
00279         cvReleaseImage(&lightmap);
00280         cvReleaseImage(&display);
00281         if (frame->nChannels > 1)
00282                 cvReleaseImage(&gray);
00283         return 0;
00284 }

00287 void show_result(planar_object_recognizer &detector, IplImage *video, IplImage *dst)
00288 {
00289         cvCopy(video, dst);
00290 
00291         if (detector.object_is_detected) {
00292                 for (int i=0; i<detector.match_number; ++i) {
00293 
00294                         image_object_point_match * match = detector.matches+i;
00295                         if (match->inlier) {
00296                                 cvCircle(dst,
00297                                         cvPoint((int) (PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->u, 
00298                                                                 int(match->image_point->scale), 0)),
00299                                                 (int)(PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->v, 
00300                                                                 int(match->image_point->scale), 0))),
00301                                         3, CV_RGB(0,255,0), -1, 8,0);
00302                         }
00303                 }
00304         }
00305 }
00306 
00307 static void augment_scene(CalibModel &model, IplImage *frame, IplImage *display)
00308 {
00309         cvCopy(frame, display);
00310 
00311         if (!model.detector.object_is_detected) 
00312                 return;
00313 
00314         CvMat *m = model.augm.GetProjectionMatrix(0);
00315         if (!m) return;
00316 
00317         double pts[4][4];
00318         double proj[4][4];
00319         CvMat ptsMat, projMat;
00320         cvInitMatHeader(&ptsMat, 4, 4, CV_64FC1, pts);
00321         cvInitMatHeader(&projMat, 3, 4, CV_64FC1, proj);
00322         for (int i=0; i<4; i++) {
00323                 pts[0][i] = model.corners[i].x;
00324                 pts[1][i] = model.corners[i].y;
00325                 pts[2][i] = 0;
00326                 pts[3][i] = 1;
00327         }
00328         cvMatMul(m, &ptsMat, &projMat);
00329         cvReleaseMat(&m);
00330 
00331         CvPoint projPts[4];
00332         for (int i=0;i<4; i++) {
00333                 projPts[i].x = cvRound(proj[0][i]/proj[2][i]);
00334                 projPts[i].y = cvRound(proj[1][i]/proj[2][i]);
00335         }
00336 
00337         std::cout << projPts[0].x << std::endl;
00338         CvMat *o2w = model.augm.GetObjectToWorld();
00339         float normal[3];
00340         for (int j=0;j<3;j++)
00341                 normal[j] = cvGet2D(o2w, j, 2).val[0];
00342         cvReleaseMat(&o2w);
00343 
00344         // we want to relight a color present on the model image
00345         // with an irradiance coming from the irradiance map
00346         CvScalar color = cvGet2D(model.image, model.image->height/2, model.image->width/2);
00347         CvScalar irradiance = model.map.readMap(normal);
00348 
00349         // the camera has some gain and bias
00350         const float *g = model.map.getGain(0);
00351         const float *b = model.map.getBias(0);
00352 
00353         // relight the 3 RGB channels. The bias value expects 0 black 1 white,
00354         // but the image are stored with a white value of 255: Conversion is required.
00355         for (int i=0; i<3; i++) {
00356                 color.val[i] = 255.0*(g[i]*(color.val[i]/255.0)*irradiance.val[i] + b[i]);
00357         }
00358 
00359         // draw a filled polygon with the relighted color
00360         cvFillConvexPoly(display, projPts, 4, color);
00361 
00362         // here should go the polygon
00363 
00364          cvCircle(display, cvPoint(projPts[0].x,projPts[0].y), 3, CV_RGB(0,255,0), 150, 150 );
00365 }
00366 
00367 bool add_detected_homography(planar_object_recognizer &detector, CamCalibration &calib)
00368 {
00369         static std::vector<CamCalibration::s_struct_points> pts;
00370         pts.clear();
00371 
00372         for (int i=0; i<detector.match_number; ++i) {
00373                         image_object_point_match * match = detector.matches+i;
00374                         if (match->inlier) {
00375                                 pts.push_back(CamCalibration::s_struct_points(
00376                                         PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->u, int(match->image_point->scale), 0),
00377                                         PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->v, int(match->image_point->scale), 0),
00378                                         PyrImage::convCoordf((float)match->object_point->M[0], int(match->object_point->scale), 0),
00379                                         PyrImage::convCoordf((float)match->object_point->M[1], int(match->object_point->scale), 0)));
00380                         }
00381         }
00382 
00383         return calib.AddHomography(0, pts, detector.H);
00384 }
00385 
00386 bool add_detected_homography(planar_object_recognizer &detector, CamAugmentation &a)
00387 {
00388         static std::vector<CamCalibration::s_struct_points> pts;
00389         pts.clear();
00390 
00391         for (int i=0; i<detector.match_number; ++i) {
00392                         image_object_point_match * match = detector.matches+i;
00393                         if (match->inlier) {
00394                                 pts.push_back(CamCalibration::s_struct_points(
00395                                         PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->u, int(match->image_point->scale), 0),
00396                                         PyrImage::convCoordf(match->image_point->v, int(match->image_point->scale), 0),
00397                                         PyrImage::convCoordf(match->object_point->M[0], int(match->object_point->scale), 0),
00398                                         PyrImage::convCoordf(match->object_point->M[1], int(match->object_point->scale), 0)));
00399                         }
00400         }
00401 
00402         a.AddHomography(pts, detector.H);
00403         return true;
00404 }
